cause.description:
There are over 70 cats in the care of The Last Chance Cat Ranch. All are neutered/spayed and fully vaccinated. Aside from foster homes, the cats live in a cage free environment and have a very large outdoor cat enclosure where they can go in and out the window whenever they want. The LCCR is a registered society in the Province of Alberta. Donations are desperately needed and appreciated. They can be made by e-mail transfer to the profile email address eginn@telusplanet.net or mailed to 3321 - 6 Avenue South, Lethbridge, AB T1J 1G4 You can also see our cats on Petfinder..check it out! www.petfinder.com and search for The Last Chance Cat Ranch. Mahatma Ghandi: "You can judge a society by the way it treats its animals." Charles Bukowski: "The more cats you have the longer you live." Collette: "There is no such thing as ordinary cats."
1. Pets are for life! Neuter/spay and keep your cats indoors!
cause.mission: Rescue stray and abandoned cats in the Lethbridge area.
